channel.title: Layers - Arcade Chip Emulator
channel.description: CHIPcade features 8 graphical layers, managed by the Graphics Co-Processor. These are perfect for backgrounds, UI, parallax scrolling, and more. You can access layers using: layer[2].width = 800 layer[R2].height = 600 layer[2].mode = "centered" l[R2].visible = true Just like registers, you can reference them by index or indirectly through a register.
